mapper.insert: insert into BBOARD (ID, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, READCOUNT, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, FILE_PATH) values(BBOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{filePath})
mapper.update: update BBOARD set READCOUNT=READCOUNT+1 where ID=#{id}
update BBOARD set WRITER=#{writer}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, WRITEDATE=sysdate where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from BBOARD where WRITER like '%'||#{searchWr}||'%'
